Plot: The gangster Colorado kidnaps Marshal McKenna. He believes that 
McKenna has seen a map which leads to a rich vein of gold in the mountains and 
forces him to show him the way. But they're not the only ones who're after the 
gold; soon they meet a group of "honorable" citizens and the cavalry crosses their way too - and that is even before they enter Indian territory.
